Name: Arena Stars
About the game: CHOOSE YOUR HERO Begin your journey with Knightingale , a noble warrior who fights for honor. Quickly unlock Mekkan , a tech genius who specializes in strike and evade tactics. Continue finding more Heroes, each with their own set of powerful abilities. Customize your favorite Hero with one of over 50 awesome skins! ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM Doomrays, Magikins and Mana Missiles! Build your battle-ready Team from over 40 (and growing) Troops and Spells. Destroy others by finding the ultimate starting line-up. That's right, order matters here! 90 SECOND BATTLES. ANYTIME. ANYWHERE. Start off with a stabbing lance against the enemy Hero. Good. Summon a Knightwing to breathe fire upon them. Very good. Throw up your shield and block the enemy's attacks. Excellent! Now, put them out of their misery with a devastating joust, your Ultimate ability! FANTASTIC! LEAGUES Learn the basics in training and hone those skills as you collect Trophies and make your way through the Battle Leagues. At the top of Gold and ready for the Pro Leagues? Good! That's where the cool new content is! Reach the top of the Pro Leagues and get early access to all the new stuff! Jealousy? That's the other player's problem. SEASONS Every month is a brand new Season and your chance to unlock exclusive new content! This is your only way to get it before everyone else. Play often and show off your progress on the Season leaderboard. PLEASE NOTE - Arena Stars is free to download and play, but includes some items that can be purchased for real money.
